programme.title: Millicent Fenwick
programme.short_synopsis: A profile of politician Millicent Fenwick (1910-1992).
programme.medium_synopsis: Following the death of Millicent Fenwick in September, Alistair Cooke profiles the late Congresswoman and details the female additions to the Senate in 1992.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
